column4: ï»¿daftykins I tried puppy linux livecd and it got hung up too....do you think it could be related to dvd drive (only cd type driver there).  I have it plugged into mobo ide pins via 80 pin cable that came with mobo....hd is sata
although windows installed off dvd drive fine
there should be no problem booting off the drive.
I use a PATA optical drive with SATA hard drive and no problems.
